original_text: You continue to fight against God. Why do you do that? God will continue to punish you. You are weak and you hurt all over. Your mind and your body have great pain.
korean_text: 너희가 어찌하여 매를 더 맞으려고 패역을 거듭하느냐 온 머리는 병들었고 온 마음은 피곤하였으며

sentences.original_text: You continue to fight against God.
God will continue to punish you.
Your mind and your body have great pain.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 마음과 몸은 큰 고통을 겪고 있습니다.
